definition[0]: an amount of money that you get unexpectedly
note[0]: windfall gain/profit etc (=high profit that you did not expect to make)
example[0]: his Â£2 million windfall in the lottery
definition[1]: a piece of fruit that has fallen off a tree
definition[2]: an amount of money that a person or business gets unexpectedly
example[1]: Falling interest rates are a windfall for homeowners refinancing their mortgages.
example[2]: The group earned a windfall profit on the sale of part of an office building in Paris.
